attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cancer patients suffer daily in mind and body.Through treatment and surgery the body is not strong like it was. Instead of asking others to help carry for us parking nearer to shop entrances would be most beneficial. Not only is there constant pain after having surgery our limbs have become  quite delicate. Pregnant mothers have parking spaces along with parental parking. We cancer patients have no outward sign of our handicap.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
